1.0.description:
No actual items to find, but will contain priority checks for all other locations. Requires being in a seed with at least 1 non-`password` world that implements `get_filler_item_name`.

To play, you need the browser extension (load it in development mode). Supports Firefox, Edge, and Chrome (until Manifest 2 support is removed). Then go to https://neal.fun/password-game/ and connect to the archipelago session. To disable AP mode, disable or remove the extension.

To generate, download the .apworld and place in your local Archipelago install's `lib/worlds` folder. You can use the Archipelago Launcher to generate the template yaml.

**People will hate you and you may hate yourself if you run this in a multiworld.**

EDIT: 2023-07-07 6:00 PM CDT
I did a bad in my .apworld so I uploaded a fixed version. If you have some games crash when connecting, this should fix it for games generated now.
1.0.title: The Password Game for Archipelago 1.1
